data.name: VRCAT
data.detailed_description:
Sketch. Design. Explore.

Oh, and this is NOT VR Chat.

VRCAT is an easy to pick up modeling tool. Quickly explore possible designs. In minutes you can create a building, a piece of furniture, a landscape ... you name it.

Hop in and feel your creativity freely flow from your mind to reality.

Features:
- export to OBJ / MTL for use in Maya or Revit
- zero learning curve
- design the city of the future in seconds
- build custom objects that can be used to create other objects (kit bashing)
- tools include: freehand painting, primitives and objects
- lights can be placed in the scene and their color and intensity can be changed
- if you are adventurous, you can place custom brushes and custom objects (OBJs) into the app's folders to customize the tool
- or, create a set of custom objects as a kit and create a kitchen design, or city scape.

See what can be done at arcat.com/vr.

Show us your projects #VRCAT.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: VRCAT's simple tool set will allow you to quickly sketch and model objects in VR. No 3D modeling experience needed to sketch a building, a car, or a far away world. Let your creativity flow.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
